name: ZaciSa: Defense of the Crayon Dimension!
name_original: ZaciSa: Defense of the Crayon Dimension!
description:
This is a Tower Defense game set inside the Crayon Empire. Use the weapons at your disposal to fend off oncoming waves of enemies and protect your Base at all costs! Use the earned ZaCoins from defeated enemies to build up your defenses and survive as long as you can. Survive and climb the Leaderboards and score higher and higher. Can you survive the onslaught?



Step inside a colorful world of Crayons! All of the gameplay graphics have been hand drawn with actual crayons on paper and brought to life before your very eyes.



A Nintendo Wii U eShop classic reborn. Originally known as ZaciSa's Last Stand for some Nintendo Wii U gamers, this classic Tower Defense game has been reborn and remade for Steam. Featuring not only new weapons and maps to try out, but an entirely new UI Menu system and other quality of life improvements. So whether you are playing for the first time or coming back for some more, plenty of fun to be had with this hand drawn game.



  • Over 20 different custom Maps
  • 5 different Game Modes: Cadet, Captain, Galactic Hero, Insanity and Endless
  • Indie crossover: Several different maps themed to Indie games featuring elements and gameplay from those games
  • Local Co-op: Play with multiple players to control the Drone/Railgun bots to give you an upper hand
  • Leaderboards
  • Achievements
  • Unlocks: Earn your way through the game by unlocking the various Maps and Concept Art page
